name: Portfolio Website
landingText: My personal portfolio website is used to showcase some of my skills, technologies, and personal projects that I have worked on.

projectContext.title: What is the purpose of this website?
text: The purpose of this website is to create my own personalized presence on the Internet where I can showcase myself and my work to potential Employers, Clients, Collaborators, or any other Tech Enthusiast.
bulletPoints: Highlighting my skills and expertise in web development, including languages, frameworks, and tools I am proficient in.
Displaying a portfolio of my projects, detailing the challenges faced, solutions implemented, and technologies used.
Providing case studies that offer in-depth insights into my showcased projects.
Facilitating easy contact for potential job opportunities, freelance projects, and collaborative ventures through a dedicated contact form or my social links.
Provide live links & GitHub repository links for my projects.
Offering downloadable resources like my resume.

challengesAndObjectives.title: Problem Overview
text: For this project, I wanted to create something simple yet unique enough to be memorable. I chose the nature theme as it is something that represents me and my hobbies and it fits well with the home page parallax effect. Finding assets such as fitting gifs proved to be a bit more tricky than anticipated.

challengesAndObjectives.title: Key Objectives
bulletPoints: Showcase myself, my projects, and my abilities.
Create a simple & clean, yet unique website.
Provide visitors with many different ways of communication via social links and contact forms.
Write a more detailed Case Study for each of the highlighted projects.
Keep the website simple and with minimal backend usage.
Provide easy access to my CV.
Make the website responsive for most devices.

achievedSolution.title: Core Features and Used Tech
bulletPoints: React-scroll and vanilla js implementation of scrolling functionality.
Emailjs/browser library used to send emails via the website.
Implementation of GPT-4o-mini API in the FAQ section used to answer questions.
Parallax effect used for the landing page.
Framer-motion library for carousels.

conclusion.title: Challenges ahead and planned features?
text: As I have previously stated I was looking to avoid adding backend service for this project but have done so in the end anyway to incorporate GPT-4o-mini. Therefore scaling this website to include a database for all project information and a separate interface for adding new projects is something that seems like a fitting next step. Also, Blog!
bulletPoints: Add an interface for adding new projects.
Implement a database to store all information about projects.
Add a blog section and interface for adding new entries.
